√jambh 'chew up, crush'

[present: [1.] jambhate  jabhate  ]

aorist: [3.] ajījabham  ajajambhat   -- [5.] jambhiṣat  

verbal: jabdha  jabhitum  

secondary: intensive: jáñjabhāna  jáñjabhat  jañjabhyáte etc. B.+   -- causative: jambháyati etc.  

derivatives: jámbha V.+  jambhá AV.+  jámbhaka B.+  jabhya? AV.  jámbhana AV.+
